10:19:41","date_last_updated":"2015-06-01 21:04:36","death_date":null,"deck":"A Japanese video game music composer, best known for composing the soundtracks of recent Shin Megami Tensei games.","description":"<h2>Megaten's Modern Maestro<\/h2>Shoji Meguro is an employee of <a data-ref-id=\"3010-442\" href=\"\/atlus-co-ltd\/3010-442\/\" slug=\"atlus-co-ltd\">           Atlus<\/a> Japan who is primarily known for his compositions for the modern era of Shin Megami Tensei series soundtracks.\u00a0 His music primarily consists of  rock and  piano. His popular soundtracks to the games <a data-ref-id=\"3030-4473\" href=\"\/shin-megami-tensei-persona-3\/3030-4473\/\" slug=\"shin-megami-tensei-persona-3\">           Persona 3<\/a> and <a data-ref-id=\"3030-21373\" href=\"\/shin-megami-tensei-persona-4\/3030-21373\/\" slug=\"shin-megami-tensei-persona-4\">           Persona 4<\/a> also contain pop and hip-hop, replete with <a data-ref-id=\"3015-251\" href=\"\/engrish\/3015-251\/\" slug=\"engrish\">           Engrishy<\/a> vocals. He has been an employee of Atlus since 1996.<br\/><br\/>He also directed the enhanced port of <a data-ref-id=\"3030-6557\" href=\"\/shin-megami-tensei-persona\/3030-6557\/\" slug=\"shin-megami-tensei-persona\">     Persona<\/a> and <a data-ref-id=\"3030-33000\" href=\"\/persona-2-innocent-sin\/3030-33000\/\" slug=\"persona-2-innocent-sin\">  Persona 2: Innocent Sin<\/a>
